events.title: Code & Coffee KC - Weekly Meetup
events.description: Join us for our weekly Code & Coffee meetup! Bring your laptop, your current project, or just come to chat with fellow developers. All skill levels welcome. We'll have coffee, snacks, and great conversation about all things tech.

events.title: Code & Coffee KC - Holiday Social
events.description: Special holiday edition of Code & Coffee! Join us for a festive gathering with your fellow developers. We'll have seasonal treats, hot cocoa, and plenty of time to work on projects or just socialize. Bring a friend who's interested in coding!

events.title: New Year Code & Coffee Kickoff
events.description: Start the new year right with Code & Coffee KC! Share your coding goals for 2025, work on projects, and connect with the local developer community. Whether you're learning to code or you're a seasoned pro, everyone is welcome.
